info.description:
===================
Connector Equipment
===================

.. !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
   !! This file is generated by oca-gen-addon-readme !!
   !! changes will be overwritten.                   !!
   !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

.. |badge4| image:: https://img.shields.io/badge/weblate-Translate%20me-F47D42.png

This module adds fields necessary to connect to an outside API
as well as template methods for the user to overwrite with thier own
API calls.

**Table of contents**

.. contents::
   :local:

Configuration
=============

This module needs no additional configuration post installation

Bug Tracker
===========

Bugs are tracked on `GitHub Issues <https://github.com/OCA/vertical-isp/issues>`_.
In case of trouble, please check there if your issue has already been reported.
If you spotted it first, help us smashing it by providing a detailed and welcomed
`feedback <https://github.com/OCA/vertical-isp/issues/new?body=module:%20connector_equipment%0Aversion:%2012.0%0A%0A**Steps%20to%20reproduce**%0A-%20...%0A%0A**Current%20behavior**%0A%0A**Expected%20behavior**>`_.

Do not contact contributors directly about support or help with technical issues.

=======

Maintainers

mission is to support the collaborative development of Odoo features and
promote its widespread use.
